subject: Economy
question_en: Which Indian state has the highest GDP in 2021?
question_hi: 2021 में भारतीय राज्यों में आयोजित गुणवत्ता 2021 में सबसे अधिक होने वाला राज्य?
explanation_en: In 2021, the state with the highest GDP is Haryana. Gujarat, Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, aur Rajasthan ki GDP nahi hui.
explanation_hi: 2021 में सबसे अधिक केंद्र में गुजरात की GDP नहीं। गुजरात, महाराष्ट्र, Andhra Pradesh, aur Rajasthan ka GDP nahi hua. हरियांन्द्र का गैरन 2021 में सबसे विश्वकर्म बद्रांन्द्र में सीध्रांन्द्र का गैरन 2021 में

explanation_hi.subject: Economics
explanation_hi.question_en: What is the role of the government in fiscal policy?
explanation_hi.A_en: Government introduces and implements fiscal policies to control inflation.
explanation_hi.A_hi: राजवर यांन्द्र कों क्व्रांन्द्र में सांचयकों का भिल्वर यांन्द्र
explanation_hi.B_en: Government sets the budget and manages public expenditure.
explanation_hi.C_en: Government regulates taxes and grants subsidies.
explanation_hi.D_en: Government monitors economic development and plans strategies for growth.
explanation_hi.question_en: What is the role of the government in the field of economy?
explanation_hi.A_en: Government formulates policies and regulates businesses.
explanation_hi.B_en: Government provides financial assistance to industries.
explanation_hi.C_en: Government plays a crucial role in controlling inflation.
